mapper.sql:
FROM infrMember a WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY ifmmSeq AND a.ifmmDelNy = #{shDelNy}
AND a.ifmmSeq = #{shValue} AND a.ifmmName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{shValue},'%') AND a.ifmmId LIKE CONCAT('%', #{shValue},'%')
mapper.select: SELECT a.* FROM infrMember a WHERE 1=1 AND ifmmSeq = #{ifmmSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE infrMember SET ifmmDelNy = 1 WHERE ifmmSeq = #{ifmmSeq}
